Later dit jaar volgt dan een grotere update.` Volledige web op de telefoon' Onderdeel in die grote update is een mobiele versie van IE9 met hardware-acceleratie voor Windows Phone. Dit is een goed voorbeeld van het samenbrengen van onderdelen binnen Microsoft om de gebruikservaring van Windows Phone te verbeteren , aldus Steve Ballmer . "We moeten het volledige web naar de telefoon brengen." De reguliere versie van IE9, waarvan recent de release candidate verscheen, gebruikt ook hardware-acceleratie voor het sneller verwerken van zware

It would also stop parents from being able to overturn a headteacher's decision to exclude their child and repeal the power for parents to make complaints about schools to the local commissioner. MPs might usefully reflect... whether it's ever healthy to have so much power vested in one person. Parliament can put the brakes on Mr Michael Gove and stop him from taking a huge gamble with the life chances of our children, Andy Burnham writes. He accuses Michael Gove of failing to build a curriculum "with all children in mind" . . Ultimately, Donald Rumsfeld blames former George H. W. Bush for not clearly resolving the disagreement and clearly charting a post-war plan before hostilities commenced, instead deferring to his point man on Iraq reconstruction, L. Paul Bremer . George H. W. Bush did not always receive, and may not have insisted on, a timely consideration of his options before he made a decision, nor did he always receive effective implementation of the decisions he made, writes Donald Rumsfeld . Paul Bremer , suggests Donald Rumsfeld , pursued a muddled reconstruction plan that more closely resembled that which was advocated by the State Department.
